query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_levels (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredientId INT NOT NULL,
  locationId INT NOT NULL,
  current_quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  reorder_point DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  par_level DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  last_counted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_counted_by VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inventory_adjustments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredientId INT NOT NULL,
  locationId INT NOT NULL,
  adjustment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  reason VARCHAR(255),
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS waste_tracking_table (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredientId INT,
  menuItemId INT,
  locationId INT NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  waste_reason VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  estimated_cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  notes TEXT,
  photo_url VARCHAR(500),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inventory_transfers_table (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredientId INT NOT NULL,
  fromLocationId INT NOT NULL,
  toLocationId INT NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  shipped_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  received_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);
command:
